scripts.install_dependencies_mac: brew install fontforge --with-python && brew install eot-utils && sudo gem install fontcustom
scripts.install_dependencies_unix: sudo apt-get install fontforge && wget http://people.mozilla.com/~jkew/woff/woff-code-latest.zip && unzip woff-code-latest.zip -d sfnt2woff && cd sfnt2woff && make && sudo mv sfnt2woff /usr/local/bin/ && gem install fontcustom
